trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings> object is used to define roles for event providers such as Critical, Notification, Analysis, and Logging.
Each role sets buffer mode events differently.

For example, a Critical role keeps the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings.MaxBufferSize%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings.MaxFlushSize%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings.UrgentFlushInterval%2A> properties small, whereas an Analysis role sets those properties to higher values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModesCollection"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection.BufferModes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection> class always contains an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.BufferModesCollection> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object to the collection.
The collection must not already contain a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings> object with the same name.
A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object to add to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object to add already exists in the collection, or the collection is read-only.
Removes all <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> objects from the collection.
This method inserts a `clear` directive into the appropriate section of the configuration file to clear all references to elements defined in a higher-level configuration file.
All elements defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file are removed.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object with the specified numeric index in the collection.
A valid index of a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object at the specified index.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object based on the specified key in the collection.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object contained in the collection.
A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object.
Removes a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object from the collection.
This method inserts a `remove` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file for any element defined in a higher-level configuration file.
If the element is defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file.
The object to remove must exist in the collection.
The name of a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
There is no <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> object with the specified key in the collection, the element has already been removed, or the collection is read-only.
